snippet: One solution against the stubbornly high rate of recidivism has long proved to be both reliable and cost-effective: education behind bars.
abstract: Editorial praises New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo for taking the bold step of announcing new financing for college classes in 10 state prisons; contends that education for prisoners has long proved to be both reliable and cost-effective in reducing stubbornly high rates of recidivism.
lead_paragraph: One solution against the stubbornly high rate of recidivism has long proved to be both reliable and cost-effective: education behind bars.

headline.main: Gov. Cuomo’s Bold Step on Prison Education
